data.eml:eml: A new species of mealybug in the genus Paracoccus Ezzat & McConnell from North America (Insecta: Coccoidea: Pseudococcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ellenrieder, Natalia Von, Stocks, Ian C. (2014): A new species of mealybug in the genus Paracoccus Ezzat & McConnell from North America (Insecta: Coccoidea: Pseudococcidae). Zootaxa 3873 (1): 25-36, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.1.2
